body:
> On the one hand, running the checks might find some silly errors with models, so could be good to run in CI. On the other hand, I don't know how to fix this, so I wonder if removing the check from CI is reasonable.

I wouldn't add it until we fix it, but I also wouldn't mind having it run. Maybe file a bug about it and remove it?
body_text:
On the one hand, running the checks might find some silly errors with models, so could be good to run in CI. On the other hand, I don't know how to fix this, so I wonder if removing the check from CI is reasonable.

I wouldn't add it until we fix it, but I also wouldn't mind having it run. Maybe file a bug about it and remove it?
body_html:
On the one hand, running the checks might find some silly errors with models, so could be good to run in CI. On the other hand, I don't know how to fix this, so I wonder if removing the check from CI is reasonable.

I wouldn't add it until we fix it, but I also wouldn't mind having it run. Maybe file a bug about it and remove it?
